content:
CS 260P - Algorithms Midterm 2 Study Questions

Doing the reading from Chapters 12-14, as well as studying your notes from the classroom lectures and solving the following questions will provide a good preparation for the second midterm exam, scheduled for Tuesday, February 27, in our usual classroom and time.

  1. Problem R-12.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  2. Problem C-12.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  3. Problem C-12.7 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  4. Problem C-12.9 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  5. Problem C-12.10 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  6. Problem C-12.11 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  7. Problem C-12.14 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  8. Problem A-12.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  9. Problem A-12.2 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  10. Problem A-12.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  11. Problem C-13.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  12. Problem C-13.4 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  13. Problem C-13.13 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  14. Problem C-13.14 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  15. Problem C-13.15 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  16. Problem A-13.1 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  17. Problem A-13.3 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  18. Problem C-14.2 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  19. Problem C-14.7 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
  20. Problem A-14.6 from Goodrich-Tamassia.
